item.title: Unjail command problem :(
item.dc:creator: @kyle2kylek kyle2kylek
item.description:
@kyle2kylek wrote:

[code]} else if (command.startsWith(“unjail”) && playerRights >= 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(7);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.toX = 3281;
		p.toY = 2771;
		p.action = 0;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been unjailed by " + playerName);
		sM("You have unjailed "+p.playerName+".");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to unjail..");
            }[/code]Make it like thisss

item.title: Unjail command problem :(
item.dc:creator: @prideofpk prideofpk
item.description:
@prideofpk wrote:

u need another script i had the same issue on my server

try using this one…

[code]if (command.startsWith(“unjail”) && playerRights >= 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(7);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.toX = 3281;
		p.toY = 2771;
		p.action = 0;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been unjailed by " + playerName);
		sM("You have unjailed "+p.playerName+".");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to unjail..");
            }[/code]

item.title: Unjail command problem :(
item.dc:creator: @rosspk rosspk
item.description:
@rosspk wrote:

hey my unjail command on my 317 looks like this

{ if (command.startsWith("unjail") && playerRights >= 1) { try { String otherPName = command.substring(5); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); 
                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.toX = 3088;
		p.toY = 3491;
		p.action = 1;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been released from jail by " + playerName);
		sM("You have released "+p.playerName+".");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to jail..");
            }
        }
              }</blockquote>

but when i do ::unjail and player name it says name doesn’t exist can anyone help please.

Read full topic
